website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable wood hangers that make it easy to replace all of your current plastic and wire hangers.
pros: Smooth wood hangers lie flat to save space in smaller or cramped closets
Each hanger includes notches for hanging straps
Non-slip hangers work well for pants and other garments
cons: Some hangers arrive not fully sanded

customer_reviews.title: Worst "wooden" hangers I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packs expecting to replace my miscellaneous collection of plastic hangers. As soon as I took out the first hanger from the pack I knew I was going to return them. The wood feels way too lightweight, they have a plastic like quality, almost like MDF. The "wood" is rough (especially around the cut-outs) and the joints are not lined up, nor do they look like they would hold up over time. Do not buy! EDIT: I received another pack of hangers out of the blue, I can only assume they want me to re-review the product. After inspection... still awful.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Some of the hangers had what look to be mold and 2 came cracked. I was excited about these before I saw them
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rzeznik

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These wooden hangers are just okay. The wood is a little rough. Will need to be careful not to snag clothing. They seem weaker than my husbands that he has had for years. But I am replacing all my plastic hangers with wooden and this is what I can afford for now. If you need a lot of hangers these are a good value but don’t expect high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers For a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers though I think it would have been even cheaper to get some from Ikea. No matter, these have the little notch things on them whereas the Ikea ones do not. These are really good and cheap enough. Plenty to switch out old hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed more hangers and bought these, the is not much to review on hangers..... The wood and finish is nice very smooth and nothing to snag on clothes. None of the hangers that I received are warped, all were nice and straight. I like that the wire loop rotates easy so you can turn it rather than removing the clothes if you want it to face a different way. I would and will buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: toms_jeep

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The wood on most of the hangers has some very sharp/jagged edges, a few of which are on the verge of being splinters. I will not use these with delicate shirts or clothing because I fear they will rip into the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they are hangers
customer_reviews.text: The prices on wooden hangers of this style on Amazon have gone up quite a bit over the past few years. These were the cheapest available with Prime shipping, but the quality is still top notch. You'd have to really beat them up good to make it break. I also like how I can rotate the hook, which makes ensuring everything faces the same way really easy. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MuNaught

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken.
customer_reviews.text: Some cane broken. I don’t have the time nor the patience to return something this inexpensive but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Breedlove McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of these hangers. The metal hanger portion is very small. It would not fit on standard-sized clothing rods in my home. The size of metal hook was also inconsistent across the hangers in the pack. Some would fit on certain rods, while others would not. The slack rod was very poorly assembled on many of the hangers. It did not line up evenly, so I have serious doubts about how long it would last without breaking. This supplier really needs to work on quality control. I returned these and would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Hangers Came with Mold
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hangers had mold on them in the unsealed parts of the wood. The straight bar is unsealed. Had to return because I do not want mold in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not premiu
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call these premium. Not the cheapest, but certain not perfect quality either. Used these for a wedding project and had to sort through which ones were better than others. Many had imperfections I could look past if I was just using them as hangers in my closet. But because each hanger is a gift, I had to be more picky. I think I would try something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Huge upgrade, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these because they definitely upgraded my closet and I expect they will last a long time. They weren't 100% perfect because some of the hangers were much darker than the others, and the middle rod fell off a few, but overall very satisfied with my purchase for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price the hangers are fine and they do the job. The only issue I had was that some areas were rough in the wood that could snag clothing. It was sort of a hit and miss on which ones were fine and which ones had rough patches. Other than that the hangers were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great value, exactly what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers, they're cheaper on Amazon and they're sturdy. They look great and can hold up coats much better than your regular plastic ones. Will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Replace every hanger with these
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12 packs of these over past 2 years. Everything in my home is hanging on them. People comment on them when I hang their coats, it makes me feel like I live in luxury atelier
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good, but maybe not the best for silky items
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a lot of these hangers. The only downside is they’re not perfectly smooth, so I always worry about picking my silk or silky-type shirts.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. They are sturdy, smooth and look very elegant. I had re-hung (and organized) all my husbands shirts in 15 minutes with them. Makes the closet looks so much better (think Zen) than the old variously-colored plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE MANNING

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, several hangers with MULTIPLE rough areas - NOT feasible to hang clothing as they get caught. I bought 2 boxes and will be returning them. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sugeiy

customer_reviews.title: really good hangers
customer_reviews.text: I like wood hangers and these did not let me down. I like the swivel hook and the notched end to hang jackets on to keep from distorting the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: unclewimp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product, I am amazed by the quality of these hangers, they also look really good, will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Morales Linette

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap wooden hanger
customer_reviews.text: good deal for the price, not the best but at $1.00 ea. they're great for jeans or coats that would normally warp or bend a plastic hanger. This was my second time to purchase in less than a year. time will tell how long they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: nicholas765673838

customer_reviews.title: Awesome option.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister and she loves them! They are very cute and are the perfect shade of bamboo to go with the astatic of her room.
customer_reviews.author: 💜Kiki.L.G💜

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hangers
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! They look so nice and sophisticated. Their a little grabby with cloths but I’m sure that will wear out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hangers
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are very nice. They seem to be of good quality and sturdy. Also, they arrived quickly and were very nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cini

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers were even better than I expected. They are wonderful looking, sturdy and good quality. I will probably be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved theses hangers in what seemed to be a repackage box maybe because of mishandling during shipment. I was short 5 hangers and 6 were broken. I will blame the shortage and the breaking on shipping but the poor quality of the hangers makes it understandable as to why 6 were broken. Not worth the money but hey you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: A friend did her closet and want the these somethinf different didnt find it stores.. got it online fast too..
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL MOC

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Hanger quality is very good very satisfied,thick work,the individual aIso very Ike,very satisfied with the clothes,the price is saison affordabIe cIothes hanger is very berutifuI,alsovery practicaI.the cIothes at home are hanging.convenient or fInd cIothes hanger is good cheap.DeIivery is aIso very fast,worth buying!This next enough,the clothes no longer worry about the shoulder deformation.
customer_reviews.author: Srunabcx0155

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers were perfect for my project of making personalized hangers for my bridal party! The light wood color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Wooden hangers
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I bought the hangers. They are very strong and durable. I love the wood and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid, smooth hangers
customer_reviews.text: Good hangers. The wood is all same color, and they are made the same - so hang at same level on wardrobe bar. Smooth too - no rough bits on hanger for clothes to snag. Better quality that other hangers I purchased for more money in the past. I like these hangers, especially for price.
customer_reviews.author: microcameraguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hangers for RVs
customer_reviews.text: Straight, smooth, well finished wooden hangers at a good price. Perfect for use in our RV, as they take up the least space, and will not droop like plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quality product, bought several units and no more crappy plastic hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Leiva

customer_reviews.title: These were lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good wooden hangers for the price. I don't know how durable they will be, but they seem to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: wooden hangers that are absolute bangers
customer_reviews.text: Want to feel like your wardrobe is classier than it really is? Upgrading from plastic hangers to wood will make you feel 10% better than yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Watts

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy wooden hanger.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent hangers. Got 20 and love them for blouses, turtleneck shirts and jackets. They are sturdy. I thought the price was a little high but they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dede12

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Long lasting Wooden Hangers.!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these come in packs of 30 when they arrived I did receive 2 that were a bit damaged. The bar had came off so I tried to put it back together however, they have not came apart at all they are pretty sturdy on my heavy uniform for work so I’m rating them five stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered these 3x.. very satisfied. All hangers are well made. Good values.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie V

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Damaged my fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Returning immediately. The wood is splintered at the tops (near the metal piece) on most of the hangers and the lacquer used is sticky in places. I put my blouses and a dress on the hanger and it quickly snagged the fabric. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Alexys Moore

customer_reviews.title: Happy hanging
customer_reviews.text: Suitable for a variety of garment type. Smooth finish means no snagging of delicate clothing yet strong enough for big coats.
customer_reviews.author: Elodee J.

customer_reviews.title: Wooden surface is NOT sanded nor finished properly
customer_reviews.text: The wood isnt sanded nor lacquered to be smooth in its finish. Product photos are deceiving. The rough surfaces scratch softer garments such as silk and thin cotton. Quality control is nonexistent. Disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Song C

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers at a great price. I swapped out my whole closet with wood hangers, and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! They are smooth, made well, and match the natural finish of my other hangers that are not Utopia brand.
customer_reviews.author: suziq

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the hangers like the ones you get in a hotel becaus those are usually sturdy. These are very similar to some I’ve seen in boutiques and hotels.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: great job holding clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my coats. They haven't messed it up at all. They are still hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Creglow

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest, these are cheap hangers. They're sturdy enough for most clothes, bit don't expect longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Phill S

customer_reviews.title: hope you have sandpaper handy
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the fact that the bar for hanging pants were unfinished and rough. I bought these hangers to hang my dress clothes on, but my pants were snagging on the bar so I had to use sandpaper on all 25 hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality. They work well for heavy clothes like suits and coats. I initially purchased a box and liked them so much I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and look
customer_reviews.text: I received these one day after ordering. They were packed very well as to avoid damage and looked exactly as described. I'm very pleased with this product and I'm in the process of ordering more. I would recommend these to anyone look for a good sturdy wood hanger.
customer_reviews.author: David P Jackson Sr

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got these to monogram for my bridesmaid at my wedding. They came in as advertised and will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: They’re hanging tough...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be nice... Time will tell. Quality seems to be nice and what more can you ask for? I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Etchison

customer_reviews.title: worth buying
customer_reviews.text: looks great and not cheap made will buy again at least one more set in time
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Rought and surface full of splinters
customer_reviews.text: The wood isn't smooth at all. It's been pulling at the threads of the nice shirts and sweaters I have. If you buy these, use them to hang jeans or khakhis but nothing nice / soft / fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Needed hangers for entryway cost closet. Wanted to make sure i got something sturdy that wouldn’t beak easily. As expected. Quality hangers at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but has its issues
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy more hangers to match the ones I got from Ikea. They are a very similar style but the wood is not as smooth and is slightly discolored. But I don’t think it’ll affect the clothes and it isn’t so noticeable when looking at the closet. Overall, nice hangers. I’d consider buying again. (I haven’t had them long enough to comment on their durability, will update if I have any issues with that)
customer_reviews.author: m. harris

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: They work for now, but I have a feeling they'll fall apart any time. Cheap quality, need to handle very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Gohar Yepremyan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bridesmaid robe hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hangers! They came in perfect condition and will work great for the purpose I bought them! I have a Cricut machine, so I made decals to put all of the names of my bridesmaids, as well as my wedding date! The girls are getting monogrammed robes as their bridesmaid gift, and the hangers are the perfect cherry on top!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our guest rooms. They seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Endieveri III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Thin yet sturdy for coats.
customer_reviews.text: I totally LOVE these! They are thin yet sturdy. I accidentally ordered this product twice (as I am new to online shopping) but I gave some to my sister who also loves them and I will probably replace most of the hangers I have now, with these.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Osterbeck

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but cloths might slide off
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty, and work well for heavy cloths like jackets. Short sleeve shirts slide down however
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not in natural finish (as my first order of this product was). This most recent order had a polyurethane finish. Thus, it is not quite "non-slip"
customer_reviews.author: Tadeusz

customer_reviews.title: Good starter hangers
customer_reviews.text: Needed to order some hangers for laser engraving. Quality looks good. Nice shine gloss to hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Stitt123

customer_reviews.title: Bottom part of hanger watch out
customer_reviews.text: It came with a few of the bottom parts of the hanger broken but the top part is nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging of the hangers themselves
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Item arrived as described and on time. Excellent packaging of the hangers themselves. I'm probably moving soon and made sure to keep the box the hangers arrived in so that I could repack them easily.
customer_reviews.author: burning_chrome

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my new collection of button down shirts!
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but the finishing is not great.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are as expected. They work decently well, but there are definitely ones with very rough finishing where the wood is scratchy and not well sanded. I would say you get what you pay for, but ikea has a better price with nicer hangers. I'll keep these for now but will slowly replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing and very effective. It’s sterdy and of great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality hangers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, came in nice package. It seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: askfortamn45y

customer_reviews.title: Definitely lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are good for hanging lightweight clothing, but not winter coats.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Dostal

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Quality hangers; all were functional and seem to match hargers I've purchased in stores. These were shipped in the retail packaging, which was a sturdy box, so I had no issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: One of the hangers that I received had a broken hook and is unusable. Given how expensive they are, I would have liked them to be more durable because I want to be able to use them for as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: A little tight on a standard bar
customer_reviews.text: These were snug on a standard closet bar. Just pry them open a bit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Rough around the edges
customer_reviews.text: I had to sand the edges of the hangers so that it wouldn't get caught in my clothes. Once I did that, I had an average set of wooden hangers - does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, space saving hanger.
customer_reviews.text: I've started replacing my plastic hangers with wood and purchased these as general use hangers. The quality is good, no splinters, and they appear to be very durable. They also take up less space than wood other hangers (Ikea). I will purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Standard hangers. Wish they were more polished. Clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Standard hangers. Wish they were more polished. Clothing tends to scrape along a unsmooth surface. Can potentially pull fibers in your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Kravchenko

customer_reviews.title: Wood is rough not smooth
customer_reviews.text: These wood hangers are rough and unfinished on the top where your shirt will sit. It feels like the fabric is going to catch as you slide the hanger in. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura DiGennaro

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected surprise in Box
customer_reviews.text: When I opened one of the two sealed Boxes I ordered, I was shocked to see a huge Spider running in there! I immediately had to take them outside for further examination. 🕷
customer_reviews.author: Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hangers are not as thick as I thought they were, but they are still decent.
customer_reviews.author: Garlicluvr

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly functional, nice wooden hangers.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfectly adequate. The wood wasn't splintery or rough as in some other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They look good in the closet, glad we got rid of all the ugly plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: gabby mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, wood recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and I had a hard time finding wooden hangers for a decent price, this is the best I could do. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: and better quality all around (and pretty much the same price)
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and go to The Container Store. Their hangers are SO much nicer. A little bit heavier, and better quality all around (and pretty much the same price)!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Solid hangers solid investment
customer_reviews.text: These hangers get the job done. The only thing that I will warn is that they're probably slightly louder than your average plastic hanger. But that's wood for ya. Otherwise, they hang things and they have a very solid design.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Good but weak
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers and nice color. These were great and bought another they are good but feel a bit flimsy. So I knocked out a star.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Total Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Quality wood hangers, and a total steal for the price. Shirts stay on the hangers and don't fall off. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Only improvement would be to sand the grove edges. Otherwise fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wood hangers with nice sized metal hook. I expect them to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hanger!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! They match the photo and are strong! Great Company too delivered real fast! Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Hangers for College
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Perfect for my son to use at college.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: work well, didn't have the issues with rough spots like others mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: lorac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are exactly what I expected them to be. I really liked how they were packaged to minimize unnecessary resources.
customer_reviews.author: 75peaches

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made solid wood hangers
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made solid wood hangers. Really can hold a heavy coat or jeans. Came on time and in good condition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KJT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not exactly cheap but seem durable. Very smooth and polished .
customer_reviews.author: M. Shand

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hangers were just thrown in box. Only received 19/20 hangers and three were already broken. Had to send back for replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Good Hangers
customer_reviews.text: well made, however finish is a bit rough might be an issue with something delicate
customer_reviews.author: havet1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints whatsoever. Packaging was neat and organized and hangers were a nice high quality.. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: most of the hangers are good but I expected a little better on the quality side
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend,
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are rough, and snags garments. And one of the bottom pieces was broken right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good hangers
customer_reviews.text: I hate the mastic hangers, this are very strong and keep the clothes without wrinkles
customer_reviews.author: ROGER

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels decent-good for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our baby's crib. Haven't used it yet but it fits the crib we bought and looks perfect. Like the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Utopia Home Non-Slip Premium Wooden Hangers - 360-Degree Rotatable Hook - Durable & Slim - Shoulder Grooves - Lightweight Hangers for Coats, Suits, Pants and Jackets - Natural Finish - (Pack of 20)
feature_bullets: Pack of 20 natural finish wooden hangers with 360-degree rotating feature
Lightweight, yet strong in construction, to efficiently hang heavy garments like coats, suits, and jackets
Suitable for all types, sizes, and styles of clothing
Perfectly shaped notches along the shoulders allow you to hang shirts, blouses and dresses effortlessly
The hangers are non-slip and provide the perfect solution for hanging pants and other garments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,494 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
